name: Pong! (hoskinggregory)
description:
My first full game made using Unity. Feel free to leave feedback and/or suggestions, as I look forward to learning more and potentially expanding upon this game. (The game is two-player at the moment, writing AI that can actually be beat is difficult!)

Enjoy! :)

Soundtrack by Patrick de Arteaga: https://patrickdearteaga.com/
